sentences.en: Bratbakk had more ability than the media gave him credit for.
sentences.cn: 布拉特巴克比媒体称赞的要有才华。

sentences.en: Buyers use different ruses to wring free credit out of their suppliers.
sentences.cn: 买主们千方百计想从供货商那儿无息赊购。

sentences.en: Credit must go to Fiona for making sure everything ran smoothly.
sentences.cn: 应该感激菲奥娜使一切得以顺利进行。

sentences.en: Do credit me with a little intelligence!
sentences.cn: 你要相信我还是有点智商的！

sentences.en: Evans is credited with inventing the system.
sentences.cn: 据信是埃文斯发明这个系统的。

sentences.en: he has 65 Tournament wins to his credit.
sentences.cn: 他获得65次联赛冠军。

sentences.en: His gift was an extremely kind gesture. Credit where credit's due.
sentences.cn: 他的礼物是很友好的表示，这值得称赞。

sentences.en: I have twenty novels and countless magazine stories to my credit.
sentences.cn: 我著有20部小说，还在杂志上发表了无数篇文章。

sentences.en: It would be wrong for us to take all the credit.
sentences.cn: 如果我们把所有功劳都揽到自己身上，那就不对了。

sentences.en: Make a note of credit card numbers and check expiry dates.
sentences.cn: 记下信用卡卡号，核对有效期限。

sentences.en: Much of Manchester United’s success can be credited to their manager.
sentences.cn: 曼联队的胜利大半应该归功于他们的主教练。

sentences.en: Now he needs only two credit hours to graduate.
sentences.cn: 现在他只需再修两个学分就可以毕业了。

sentences.en: On the credit side, he's always been wonderful with his mother.
sentences.cn: 就优点而言，他对母亲一直很孝顺。

sentences.en: on the credit side, the text is highly readable.
sentences.cn: 好的方面来说，这篇课文可读性很强。

sentences.en: please give me credit for some sense.
sentences.cn: 请给我应有的肯定。

sentences.en: Some of the credit for her relaxed manner must go to Andy.
sentences.cn: 她会如此放松，一部分应该归功于安迪。

sentences.en: The family was forced to live on credit from local merchants.
sentences.cn: 这家人不得不靠向当地商人赊账生活。

sentences.en: The main investor in the project is the French bank Credit National.
sentences.cn: 该项目的主要投资商是法国的国民信贷银行。

sentences.en: The store agreed to let him have credit.
sentences.cn: 商店同意他赊购。

sentences.en: The witness’s story gained credit with the jury.
sentences.cn: 证人的陈述被陪审团采信了。

sentences.en: to their credit, both sides managed to overcome the elements and produce an exciting match.
sentences.cn: 值得表扬的是，双方克服了恶劣天气的影响，进行了一场精彩的比赛。

sentences.en: TSB's monthly credit card rate is now hiked from 1.95% to 2.05%.
sentences.cn: TSB银行的信用卡月利率现在从1.95%提高到了2.05%。

sentences.en: Using a credit card to pay for an order is simplicity itself.
sentences.cn: 用信用卡支付订单再简单不过了。

sentences.en: We found his statement hard to credit.
sentences.cn: 我们觉得他的说法令人难以信服。

sentences.en: What’s the credit limit on your Visa card?
sentences.cn: 你的维萨卡信用额度是多少？

sentences.en: You are protected instantly if a thief misuses your credit card.
sentences.cn: 如果小偷盗用你的信用卡，你的卡会立即受到保护。

sentences.en: You're a nice girl, Lettie, and your kind heart does you credit.
sentences.cn: 你是个好女孩儿，莱蒂，你的善良值得称赞。

sentences.en: your concern does you credit.
sentences.cn: 你的关切增加了你的威信。

words.tran_cn: 可信的；声誉好的；值得称赞的
信任；凭证；祭器台（等于credence table，credenza）
好信誉；有资格接受信用贷款
相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂

phrases.tran_cn: n. 消费信贷；消费品信用贷款
信贷紧缩；信贷危机（等于credit crisis）
信用信息；信用情报；信用调查报告
信用风险；信贷风险；信用危机
信用制度；信贷制度；赊购或赊销制度
（立即或勉强地）给予应得荣誉

phrases.phrase: do someone credit (或 do credit to someone)
phrases.tran_cn: 为某人增光；给某人带来荣誉
（尤指犹豫地或惊讶地）称赞某人；肯定某人（的品质或成就）
作为好的方面；从好的方面说
n. 农村信用合作社，农村信用社
值得表扬的是（尤指克服困难做成了值得赞扬的事）

trans.tran_cn: 赊购，结余，贷记，有权索要的款项，赞扬，为…赢得好感的人/事物，演职员表，学习单元
trans.tran_en: an arrangement with a shop, bank etc that allows you to buy something and pay for it later

trans.tran_cn: 存钱，把…归于，认为…有，相信
trans.tran_en: to believe or admit that someone has a quality, or has done something good

trans.tran_cn: 信任， 相信； 把…记入贷方； 把…归于
trans.tran_en: to add money to a bank account
